snippet: District of Columbia residents will vote in November on whether to legalize marijuana, the Board of Elections said Wednesday.
abstract: District of Colombia residents will vote on whether to legalize marijuana following approval of initiative by the Board of Elections.
lead_paragraph: District of Columbia residents will vote in November on whether to legalize marijuana, the Board of Elections said Wednesday.

headline.main: Marijuana Legalization to Be on D.C. Ballot
headline.print_headline: Marijuana Legalization to Be on Ballot
